Lyric:
[by:陈囿]
[00:05.00]I miss you so much now I call again
[00:08.67]Come, come tonight
[00:10.31]Just hold me tight
[00:12.21]This desert rain your my guiding light
[00:16.52]
[00:45.77]We, We were lost
[00:47.71]This world of pain
[00:49.64]I miss you so much now I call again
[00:53.25]Come, come tonight
[00:55.14]Just hold me tight
[00:57.35]This desert rain your my guiding light
[01:00.93]We, we were lost
[01:02.62]This walk of tide
[01:04.72]We forgot about love, You forgot about us
[01:08.02]Now I am here
[01:10.03]Dreams become real
[01:15.25]
[01:30.32]I feel like a sand that’s blown away
[01:34.57]Back into the storm
[01:37.85]I’m inside this dream
[01:40.30]That feels just like a desert rain
[01:46.21]
[02:00.98]We, We were lost
[02:02.62]This world of pain
[02:04.55]I miss you so much now I call again
[02:08.07]Come, come tonight
[02:10.08]Just hold me tight
[02:12.14]This desert rain your my guiding light
[02:15.76]We, we were lost
[02:17.63]This walk of tide
[02:19.66]We forgot about love, You forgot about us
[02:23.13]Now I am here
[02:24.94]Dreams become real
[02:28.08]
[02:45.34]I feel like a sand that’s blown away
[02:49.47]Back into the storm
[02:52.72]I’m inside this dream
[02:55.30]That feels just like a desert rain
[03:00.76]
[03:01.30]You will always have my soul
[03:08.75]Hidden dreams and secret words
[03:21.95]Missing you
[03:30.26]
[03:45.62]I feel like a sand that’s blown away
[03:49.48]Back into the storm
[03:52.45]I’m inside this dream
[03:55.19]That feels just like a desert rain
[04:01.38]
